headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Survival Series
content:
Batten down the hatches against wave after wave of attacking enemies – including Ballas, LSPD officers, Lost MC bikers, Avon Hertz’s mercenary bodyguards, Juggernauts, and more – in the Survival Series to earn 2X GTA$ and RP through April 6.

Look out for a call from Ron after successfully completing the Meth'd Up mission in GTA Online to get started on Survival Series mode. All players must reach rank 15.
